ygData.subject: Re: Chains does not interfere with Drowsy/Deeds.
ygData.msgSnippet: ... There is no fun in stopwatches for me ;-) I either open up a can of whoopass, or I get beat into the ground like a little baby.  Either way, I don t mind
ygData.messageBody:
> Damage is by definition random and variable. Your stopwatch
> is not (at least one would hope not :).

There is no fun in stopwatches for me ;-)

I either open up a can of whoopass, or I get beat into the ground
like a little baby. Either way, I don't mind sampling a few ice
giants with my swords, hehe.

an ice giant says 'Get in mah belly'
an ice giant says 'I ate a baby!'

well actually, it's more like:

an ice giant tries to hit YOU, but YOU dodge.
an ice giant tries to hit YOU, but YOU are Harmonic. (lol)
Harmonic slashes an ice giant for 49 damage. (blam)
Harmonic slashes an ice giant for 37 damage. (pow)
Harmonic slashes an ice giant for 23 damage. (boing)
Harmonic slashes an ice giant for 44 damage. (whammo)
Harmonic has slain an ice giant!

Harmonic says 'Oh a gotta live on here, haa haa haa'
Harmonic says 'That ice giant got a little hot under the collar'

Harm.
